00026  * libcfs/libcfs/heap.c

00036 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00037 
00038 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00039 
00040 #define CBH_ALLOC(ptr, h)                                               \
00041 do {                                                                    \
00042         if (h->cbh_cptab) {                                             \
00043                 if ((h)->cbh_flags & CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW)              \
00044                         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC_GFP((ptr), h->cbh_cptab,       \
00045                                              h->cbh_cptid, CBH_NOB,     \
00046                                              GFP_ATOMIC);               \
00047                 else                                                    \
00048                         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC((ptr), h->cbh_cptab,           \
00049                                          h->cbh_cptid, CBH_NOB);        \
00050         } else {                                                        \
00051                 if ((h)->cbh_flags & CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW)              \
00052                         LIBCFS_ALLOC_ATOMIC((ptr), CBH_NOB);            \
00053                 else                                                    \
00054                         LIBCFS_ALLOC((ptr), CBH_NOB);                   \
00055         }                                                               \
00056 } while (0)
00057 
00058 #define CBH_FREE(ptr)   LIBCFS_FREE(ptr, CBH_NOB)
00059 
00069 static int
00070 cfs_binheap_grow(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00071 {
00072         struct cfs_binheap_node ***frag1 = NULL;
00073         struct cfs_binheap_node  **frag2;
00074         int hwm = h->cbh_hwm;
00075 
00076         /* need a whole new chunk of pointers */
00077         LASSERT((h->cbh_hwm & CBH_MASK) == 0);
00078 
00079         if (hwm == 0) {
00080                 /* first use of single indirect */
00081                 CBH_ALLOC(h->cbh_elements1, h);
00082                 if (h->cbh_elements1 == NULL)
00083                         return -ENOMEM;
00084 
00085                 goto out;
00086         }
00087 
00088         hwm -= CBH_SIZE;
00089         if (hwm < CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE) {
00090                 /* not filled double indirect */
00091                 CBH_ALLOC(frag2, h);
00092                 if (frag2 == NULL)
00093                         return -ENOMEM;
00094 
00095                 if (hwm == 0) {
00096                         /* first use of double indirect */
00097                         CBH_ALLOC(h->cbh_elements2, h);
00098                         if (h->cbh_elements2 == NULL) {
00099                                 CBH_FREE(frag2);
00100                                 return -ENOMEM;
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 h->cbh_elements2[hwm >> CBH_SHIFT] = frag2;
00105                 goto out;
00106         }
00107 
00108         hwm -= CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE;
00109 #if (CBH_SHIFT * 3 < 32)
00110         if (hwm >= CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE) {
00111                 /* filled triple indirect */
00112                 return -ENOMEM;
00113         }
00114 #endif
00115         CBH_ALLOC(frag2, h);
00116         if (frag2 == NULL)
00117                 return -ENOMEM;
00118 
00119         if (((hwm >> CBH_SHIFT) & CBH_MASK) == 0) {
00120                 /* first use of this 2nd level index */
00121                 CBH_ALLOC(frag1, h);
00122                 if (frag1 == NULL) {
00123                         CBH_FREE(frag2);
00124                         return -ENOMEM;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         if (hwm == 0) {
00129                 /* first use of triple indirect */
00130                 CBH_ALLOC(h->cbh_elements3, h);
00131                 if (h->cbh_elements3 == NULL) {
00132                         CBH_FREE(frag2);
00133                         CBH_FREE(frag1);
00134                         return -ENOMEM;
00135                 }
00136         }
00137 
00138         if (frag1 != NULL) {
00139                 LASSERT(h->cbh_elements3[hwm >> (2 * CBH_SHIFT)] == NULL);
00140                 h->cbh_elements3[hwm >> (2 * CBH_SHIFT)] = frag1;
00141         } else {
00142                 frag1 = h->cbh_elements3[hwm >> (2 * CBH_SHIFT)];
00143                 LASSERT(frag1 != NULL);
00144         }
00145 
00146         frag1[(hwm >> CBH_SHIFT) & CBH_MASK] = frag2;
00147 
00148  out:
00149         h->cbh_hwm += CBH_SIZE;
00150         return 0;
00151 }

00166 struct cfs_binheap *
00167 cfs_binheap_create(struct cfs_binheap_ops *ops, unsigned int flags,
00168                    unsigned count, void *arg, struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab,
00169                    int cptid)
00170 {
00171         struct cfs_binheap *h;
00172 
00173         LASSERT(ops != NULL);
00174         LASSERT(ops->hop_compare != NULL);
00175         if (cptab) {
00176                 LASSERT(cptid == CFS_CPT_ANY ||
00177                        (cptid >= 0 && cptid < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00178                 LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(h, cptab, cptid, sizeof(*h));
00179         } else {
00180                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(h, sizeof(*h));
00181         }
00182         if (!h)
00183                 return NULL;
00184 
00185         h->cbh_ops        = ops;
00186         h->cbh_nelements  = 0;
00187         h->cbh_hwm        = 0;
00188         h->cbh_private    = arg;
00189         h->cbh_flags      = flags & (~CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW);
00190         h->cbh_cptab      = cptab;
00191         h->cbh_cptid      = cptid;
00192 
00193         while (h->cbh_hwm < count) { /* preallocate */
00194                 if (cfs_binheap_grow(h) != 0) {
00195                         cfs_binheap_destroy(h);
00196                         return NULL;
00197                 }
00198         }
00199 
00200         h->cbh_flags |= flags & CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW;
00201 
00202         return h;
00203 }
00204 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_create);
00205 
00214 void
00215 cfs_binheap_destroy(struct cfs_binheap *h)
00216 {
00217         int idx0;
00218         int idx1;
00219         int n;
00220 
00221         LASSERT(h != NULL);
00222 
00223         n = h->cbh_hwm;
00224 
00225         if (n > 0) {
00226                 CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements1);
00227                 n -= CBH_SIZE;
00228         }
00229 
00230         if (n > 0) {
00231                 for (idx0 = 0; idx0 < CBH_SIZE && n > 0; idx0++) {
00232                         CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements2[idx0]);
00233                         n -= CBH_SIZE;
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements2);
00237         }
00238 
00239         if (n > 0) {
00240                 for (idx0 = 0; idx0 < CBH_SIZE && n > 0; idx0++) {
00241 
00242                         for (idx1 = 0; idx1 < CBH_SIZE && n > 0; idx1++) {
00243                                 CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements3[idx0][idx1]);
00244                                 n -= CBH_SIZE;
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements3[idx0]);
00248                 }
00249 
00250                 CBH_FREE(h->cbh_elements3);
00251         }
00252 
00253         LIBCFS_FREE(h, sizeof(*h));
00254 }
00255 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_destroy);
00256 
00266 static struct cfs_binheap_node **
00267 cfs_binheap_pointer(struct cfs_binheap *h, unsigned int idx)
00268 {
00269         if (idx < CBH_SIZE)
00270                 return &(h->cbh_elements1[idx]);
00271 
00272         idx -= CBH_SIZE;
00273         if (idx < CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE)
00274                 return &(h->cbh_elements2[idx >> CBH_SHIFT][idx & CBH_MASK]);
00275 
00276         idx -= CBH_SIZE * CBH_SIZE;
00277         return &(h->cbh_elements3[idx >> (2 * CBH_SHIFT)]\
00278                                  [(idx >> CBH_SHIFT) & CBH_MASK]\
00279                                  [idx & CBH_MASK]);
00280 }
00281 
00291 struct cfs_binheap_node *
00292 cfs_binheap_find(struct cfs_binheap *h, unsigned int idx)
00293 {
00294         if (idx >= h->cbh_nelements)
00295                 return NULL;
00296 
00297         return *cfs_binheap_pointer(h, idx);
00298 }
00299 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_find);
00300 
00310 static int
00311 cfs_binheap_bubble(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e)
00312 {
00313         unsigned int         cur_idx = e->chn_index;
00314         struct cfs_binheap_node **cur_ptr;
00315         unsigned int         parent_idx;
00316         struct cfs_binheap_node **parent_ptr;
00317         int                  did_sth = 0;
00318 
00319         cur_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, cur_idx);
00320         LASSERT(*cur_ptr == e);
00321 
00322         while (cur_idx > 0) {
00323                 parent_idx = (cur_idx - 1) >> 1;
00324 
00325                 parent_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, parent_idx);
00326                 LASSERT((*parent_ptr)->chn_index == parent_idx);
00327 
00328                 if (h->cbh_ops->hop_compare(*parent_ptr, e))
00329                         break;
00330 
00331                 (*parent_ptr)->chn_index = cur_idx;
00332                 *cur_ptr = *parent_ptr;
00333                 cur_ptr = parent_ptr;
00334                 cur_idx = parent_idx;
00335                 did_sth = 1;
00336         }
00337 
00338         e->chn_index = cur_idx;
00339         *cur_ptr = e;
00340 
00341         return did_sth;
00342 }
00343 
00353 static int
00354 cfs_binheap_sink(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e)
00355 {
00356         unsigned int         n = h->cbh_nelements;
00357         unsigned int         child_idx;
00358         struct cfs_binheap_node **child_ptr;
00359         struct cfs_binheap_node  *child;
00360         unsigned int         child2_idx;
00361         struct cfs_binheap_node **child2_ptr;
00362         struct cfs_binheap_node  *child2;
00363         unsigned int         cur_idx;
00364         struct cfs_binheap_node **cur_ptr;
00365         int                  did_sth = 0;
00366 
00367         cur_idx = e->chn_index;
00368         cur_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, cur_idx);
00369         LASSERT(*cur_ptr == e);
00370 
00371         while (cur_idx < n) {
00372                 child_idx = (cur_idx << 1) + 1;
00373                 if (child_idx >= n)
00374                         break;
00375 
00376                 child_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, child_idx);
00377                 child = *child_ptr;
00378 
00379                 child2_idx = child_idx + 1;
00380                 if (child2_idx < n) {
00381                         child2_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, child2_idx);
00382                         child2 = *child2_ptr;
00383 
00384                         if (h->cbh_ops->hop_compare(child2, child)) {
00385                                 child_idx = child2_idx;
00386                                 child_ptr = child2_ptr;
00387                                 child = child2;
00388                         }
00389                 }
00390 
00391                 LASSERT(child->chn_index == child_idx);
00392 
00393                 if (h->cbh_ops->hop_compare(e, child))
00394                         break;
00395 
00396                 child->chn_index = cur_idx;
00397                 *cur_ptr = child;
00398                 cur_ptr = child_ptr;
00399                 cur_idx = child_idx;
00400                 did_sth = 1;
00401         }
00402 
00403         e->chn_index = cur_idx;
00404         *cur_ptr = e;
00405 
00406         return did_sth;
00407 }
00408 
00418 int
00419 cfs_binheap_insert(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e)
00420 {
00421         struct cfs_binheap_node **new_ptr;
00422         unsigned int         new_idx = h->cbh_nelements;
00423         int                  rc;
00424 
00425         if (new_idx == h->cbh_hwm) {
00426                 rc = cfs_binheap_grow(h);
00427                 if (rc != 0)
00428                         return rc;
00429         }
00430 
00431         if (h->cbh_ops->hop_enter) {
00432                 rc = h->cbh_ops->hop_enter(h, e);
00433                 if (rc != 0)
00434                         return rc;
00435         }
00436 
00437         e->chn_index = new_idx;
00438         new_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, new_idx);
00439         h->cbh_nelements++;
00440         *new_ptr = e;
00441 
00442         cfs_binheap_bubble(h, e);
00443 
00444         return 0;
00445 }
00446 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_insert);
00447 
00454 void
00455 cfs_binheap_remove(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e)
00456 {
00457         unsigned int         n = h->cbh_nelements;
00458         unsigned int         cur_idx = e->chn_index;
00459         struct cfs_binheap_node **cur_ptr;
00460         struct cfs_binheap_node  *last;
00461 
00462         LASSERT(cur_idx != CBH_POISON);
00463         LASSERT(cur_idx < n);
00464 
00465         cur_ptr = cfs_binheap_pointer(h, cur_idx);
00466         LASSERT(*cur_ptr == e);
00467 
00468         n--;
00469         last = *cfs_binheap_pointer(h, n);
00470         h->cbh_nelements = n;
00471         if (last == e)
00472                 return;
00473 
00474         last->chn_index = cur_idx;
00475         *cur_ptr = last;
00476         cfs_binheap_relocate(h, *cur_ptr);
00477 
00478         e->chn_index = CBH_POISON;
00479         if (h->cbh_ops->hop_exit)
00480                 h->cbh_ops->hop_exit(h, e);
00481 }
00482 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_remove);
00483 
00492 void
00493 cfs_binheap_relocate(struct cfs_binheap *h, struct cfs_binheap_node *e)
00494 {
00495         if (!cfs_binheap_bubble(h, e))
00496                 cfs_binheap_sink(h, e);
00497 }
00498 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_binheap_relocate);
